name: Melody - Funni GameJam
description:
This is my first game jam completely in solo. Hope you will like it.

The goal of the game is to listen and memorize the melody.
If the next note is higher than the last you have to hit the right Arrow, if it's lower, you have to play the left Arrow.

Music and SFX was implemented with FMOD.
I was planning to release it as WebGL but VFXGraph is still not compatible.
Peplm
